lead_paragraph: From Joe Nocera's latest column in The New York Times:
snippet: All 50 attorneys general are conducting a joint investigation into the bank practices that led to the mortgage scandal, Joe Nocera reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Nocera: The States Take on Foreclosures

abstract: All 50 attorneys general are conducting a joint investigation into the bank practices that led to the mortgage scandal, Joe Nocera reports in The New York Times.
